Row.Text: Sacred Grove

The {1_TribeName} Tribe has laid claim to being the site of a sacred grove, where the visage of the Gods can be divined. Naturally, this has inspired a great many pilgrimages to the site, but these very pilgrimages may come to tarnish the tribe's way of life. Perhaps we should intervene in the matter.[NEWLINE]
Only the {1_TribeName} shall bear witness to this grove.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_PEACE] Faith[ENDCOLOR]
We have decreed that the sacred grove shall only be open to the {1_TribeName} people.
All must bear witness to this grove.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith on the {1_TribeName} tile[ENDCOLOR]
We have decreed that the sacred grove of the {1_TribeName} Tribe shall be open to all pilgrims.
This is none of our concern.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain +{1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR]
We have resolved to stay out of the matter regarding the sacred grove of the {1_TribeName} Tribe.
New Craft

The people of the {1_TribeName} Tribe have garnered a reputation for their fine {2_FontIcon} {3_Resource}. However, their traditional ties to {4_Current} hold them back from making this a profitable enterprise. Perhaps they could be encouraged to promote their new craft.[NEWLINE]
We should invest in {1_TribeName} {2_FontIcon} {3_Resource}.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]{2_TribeName} becomes a source of {3_FontIcon} {4_ResourceName}[ENDCOLOR]
We have invested in {1_TribeName} {2_FontIcon} {3_Resource}.
No. They must remain devoted to {1_Current}.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
We have declined to invest in {1_TribeName} {2_FontIcon} {3_Resource}.
The German {1_TribeName} Tribe has become world-renown for their fine {2_FontIcon} {3_Resource}.
Kidnapped Son

The son of a chieftain was recently captured in a raid led by the {1_Name} Tribe. The incident has caused great upheaval amongst the other tribes, who abhor the taking of live hostages, and they have appealed for you to intervene.[NEWLINE]
The son should be returned to their father.
We should ransom the son back to their father.
We should kill the boy.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age points[ENDCOLOR][NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[ENDCOLOR]
